sentences.sentence: A court in Serbia has released three police officers from Kosovo who were detained earlier this month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The hearing in the central town of Kraljevo said that they'd been charged with possession of weapons and explosives, but that they were free to go. It's not clear if the case will go ahead in their absence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It comes after the EU brokered talks between Serbian and Kosovo leaders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Kosovo claims the three officers were abducted from inside its territory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Serbia rejects the accusation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In a tweet, Kosovo Prime Minister Albin Kurti welcomed the officers' release, but also insisted that Serbia must be held accountable for what he called a serious human rights violation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The feud led to Kosovo blocking Serbian trucks from crossing the border and a reciprocal move from Belgrade authorities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's the image that marks the official start of the Hajj, the annual Muslim pilgrimage to Mecca in Saudi Arabia. And this year, over two million worshippers are expected to make the trip as it returns to full capacity for the first time since the pandemic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: For several days there will be a constant flow of worshippers around the Kaaba, a sacred cubic building located at the centre of the great mosque.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The first thing pilgrims do when they arrive is to make seven laps around the Kaaba to which they pray five times a day wherever they are in the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Hajj is one of the five pillars of Islam, and every Muslim who can afford it must perform it at least once in his lifetime.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But in addition to being an act of faith, it's a colossal organizational challenge for the Saudi authorities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The worshippers converge on a vast tent camp in Mina in the nearby desert for a day and night of prayer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The temperatures can reach up to 40 degrees centigrade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The government has set up 32 hospitals and 140 health centres, as well as nearly 200,000 tents for worshippers.
